tool_description: The Axesso Amazon Data Service API returns detailed Amazon product information including product title, manufacturer, reviews, size selection, price, reviews and many more. Additionally, the API supports product recommendations as provided by Amazon and invoke keyword searches to find up to 20 products per page relating to the searchterm. This service is comparable to the Amazon Product Advertising API, but presented in a more condensed manner. The usage requires a API Key in production mode....
name: Axesso - Amazon Data Service
title: Axesso - Amazon Data Service

api_list.name: lookupProduct
lookupReviews
lookupSellerPrices
api_list.description: Lookup offer from different seller for the specified product

api_list.name: lookupBestSeller
api_list.description: Lookup best seller list by providing url and page.

api_list.name: lookupSeller
api_list.description: Lookup seller details based on sellerid and domain

optional_parameters.name: sellerId
optional_parameters.description: id of the seller used for the lookup

optional_parameters.name: domainCode
optional_parameters.description: Domain code of the amazon page

api_list.name: searchByKeywordAsin
api_list.description: Search products by keyword, returning all asins for the specified page.

optional_parameters.name: withCache
optional_parameters.description: If true, proxy for same searchterm will be cached and used for next page. Might increase the response quality.

optional_parameters.name: excludeSponsored
optional_parameters.description: Set true to exclude sponsored products

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Pass the amazon category which should used for the search. Valid category list can found on the amazon website on the search selection box. **Important: If the passed category is not a valid amazon category, the response will be empty**

api_list.name: lookupSellerProducts
api_list.description: Lookup all products for a given seller page by page.

required_parameters.name: sellerId
required_parameters.description: seller id used for the lookup

required_parameters.name: domainCode
required_parameters.description: domain code of the amazon page
